scripts.start: npm run-script build --prefix static/remote/source; cp -r static/remote/source/build/* static/remote/; npm run-script build --prefix static/client/source; cp -r static/client/source/build/* static/client/; npm run-script build --prefix static/remoteTablet/source; cp -r static/remoteTablet/source/build/* static/remoteTablet/;  node app.js
